channel.title: wsl on menziess blog
channel.description: Recent content in wsl on menziess blog

item.title: Enhance Your Python-vscode Workflow
item.description: This post covers my personal workflow for python projects, using Visual Studio Code along with some other tools. A good workflow saves time and allows you to focus on the problem at hand, instead of tasks that make you feel like a robot (machines are good for that).

item.title: Install Windows Subsystem for Linux
item.description: If you’re accustomed to using a unix shell as your command-line interface, you may end up being very unproductive using Windows 10. Microsoft (in collaboration with Canonical) has made a tremendous effort into closing the gap between Linux and Windows developers by creating a kernel compatibility layer based on Ubuntu.
